title: [ENH] Customizing of regressors used in Prophet models
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**

Similar to seasonality, regressors in Prophet can also be customized (e.g. `mode` argument) ([Ref](https://facebook.github.io/prophet/docs/multiplicative_seasonality.html)). 

```python
# Python
m = Prophet(seasonality_mode='multiplicative')
m.add_seasonality('quarterly', period=91.25, fourier_order=8, mode='additive')
m.add_regressor('regressor', mode='additive')
```

`sktime` provides the capability to customize seasonality using the `add_seasonality` argument, but nothing like this for regressors. Could this functionality be added to the Prophet class?


**Describe the solution you'd like**

Some way of providing the arguments to use for each regressor which would get added here:

https://github.com/sktime/sktime/blob/4194aacaa105ef59807ea56c1bb3497b37eb1613/sktime/forecasting/base/adapters/_fbprophet.py#L95


**Describe alternatives you've considered**

None that I can think of at this time.
